item.title: 2018 - Year in Review
item.author: codecraig@gmail.com (Craig Wickesser)
item.description: In trying to keep the tradition of posting a year in review, so here it goes. Programming This year I continued working part-time on a LAMP stack app, the one that used Angular 1.x for the UI. I also continued fixing bugs and adding new features to the “web based application to assist in monitoring local government, which I still continue to do. I did move it over to use Amazon AWS hosted Elasticsearch because the single, “small” EC2 server was being overloaded.
